title: Total livestock and animal products in Canada 2018
summary: The following graph shows the Total Farm animal index value in Canada during 2018 , and the values are described using the Farm product price index ( FPPI ) as UOM .
It 's possible to see how the animal value considerably increase from January until July .
After that , it fell between July and September .
gold: The following line chart shows the farm product price index ( FPPI ) about the total livestock and animal products in Canada during 2018 . The values are significantly fluctuating over the year , showing several peaks and falls . The highest values of the indexes have been recorded during February , July and October .
